review:
Al helped fix my Noritz Tankless this morning. The heater had been giving me issues over a few days and water was intermittently not getting hot. I called another company and they checked the error codes but couldn't fix the problem..and then yesterday, it just stopped turning on.

Al was responsive and frank on the phone that he couldn't help me with an intermittent issue given there is no consistent repro. After I called him a second time when hester stopped working, he stopped by and diagnosed the flow sensor to be the issue in no time. He cleaned and everything was working again.

He also commented on my pump and polyphosphate filter setup and gave tips on how I could flush the heater myself. You can tell he has a in-depth technical knowledge of this.

I would highly recommend his services. Thanks.
name: Srinivasan R.
